game.name: Slenderman Must Die Abandoned Graveyard
game.description:
This time you find yourself at the abandoned graveyard in this brand new action packed game! Your mission in this free online shooting game is to hunt down and kill slenderman. Remember, the task is not as easy it seems to be. Only those who are very quick behind the gun can complete the mission timely. So, do you think that you are much capable of taking up this charge? Join Slenderman Must Die: Abandoned Graveyard and get ready to show off your aggressive moves! More to explore in this Halloween themed game!

The body of slenderman is hidden inside the scary church. Use your brain and focus skill to find it in the least possible time! Make sure to burn it as soon as you spot on the screen. You are sure to love to explore the city and spot 9 green pumpkins in this highly popular Halloween special game. With high quality 3D environment graphics and smooth Controls, this HTML5 horror game will keep you engrossed for hours. There are three weapons, including AK74M, Shotgun and Pistol to explore. It will be amazing to explore the Old Church, Catacombs and the abandoned graveyard. 

The thrill and fun will increase with the passing of each level in this 8 levels action game. Play like a champion and clear all the levels to wear the crown of being an action hero! No need to bother in case if you get bored at the initial few minutes! Do your best to complete each level to move to the advanced one where the bigger horror awaits you! Check out our other free scary games for kids in a quest for extra fun and adventure!
